docs.title: vendorless.core.Volume
docs.text:
Bases: Blueprint

Represents a Docker volume configuration.

Attributes:

Name Type Description name str

The name of the Docker volume.

Source code in src/vendorless/core/volume.py 
@dataclass
class Volume(Blueprint):
    """
    Represents a Docker volume configuration.
    """

    name: str = parameter()
    """The name of the Docker volume."""

    def _template_list(self) -> list[tuple[str, str]]:
        return [
            ('volume/docker-compose.yaml', 'docker-compose.yaml')
        ]

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
$ git clone git@github.com:LiamBindle/vendorless.git
$ cd vendorless
$ poetry install

docs.title: Create a New Package
docs.text:
$ poetry run vl new -o packages

name:               postgres
version:
description:        PostgreSQL database
